data.reasoning: The provided data set is severely insufficient for a celiac-safe assessment. It contains only contact information and general navigation links, with no menu details, allergen guides, or customer reviews mentioning gluten or cross-contact. Thai cuisine inherently uses gluten in many common sauces (soy sauce, oyster sauce, some curry pastes), making the default assumption high risk unless confirmed otherwise. The lack of any safety indicators forces a conservative, high-risk rating.
risk_factors: No menu details provided to identify naturally gluten-free items.
Thai cuisine frequently uses wheat/gluten in soy sauce, oyster sauce, and some pre-made curry pastes/marinades.
No evidence of dedicated gluten-free preparation areas or procedures.
No customer reviews or restaurant statements regarding allergen training or cross-contact protocols.
safe_alternatives: None can be confirmed based on the provided data.
